describe('Venue Mapper plugin', function() {
 
  var _ = require('lodash');
  var mapper = require('../../../lib/mapper');
  require('../../../lib/plugins/mapper.embed_venue')(mapper);
 
  var stub = require('../../stubs/events.json');
 
  describe('Cleanup', function(){
    it('removes the venues property from the returned source', function(){
      var mapped = mapper(stub).embedVenue('events').value();
 
      expect(mapped['venues']).not.toBeDefined();
    });
  });
 
  describe('Source is an array', function() {
    it('dereferences venue in the returned source', function() {
      var mapped = mapper(stub).embedVenue('events').value();
      var first = mapped.events[0];
 
      expect(first.venue).toEqual({
         address:{
            city:{
               id:36560,
               name:'Guayaquil',
               lon_lat:[
                  -79.90795,
                  -2.20584
               ]
            },
            country:{
               id:155,
               name:'Ecuador',
               isocode:'EC'
            },
            region:{
               id:845,
               name:'Guayas',
               isocode:'G'
            },
            composed_name:'Guayaquil,G,Ecuador',
            street:'La Aurora ',
            zip_code:'Samborondon'
         },
         background:null,
         logos:null,
         social_links:[
 
         ],
         social_mentions_count:0,
         description:'',
         followers_count:0,
         comments_count:0,
         id:3520,
         name:'Villa Club Cancha',
         email:null,
         slug:'villa-club-cancha',
         website_url:'http://www.guayaquilpaintball.com/',
         phone_number:'593 04 2399005',
         geolocation:{
            lat:14.624795,
            lon:-90.532818
         },
         ratings:null,
         updated_at:'2013-11-29T08:53:44+01:00',
         published:true,
         review_count:0,
         _links:{
            city:'http://api.clubjudge.com/baws/api/cities/guayaquil',
            comments:'http://api.clubjudge.com/baws/api/venues/3520/comments',
            country:'http://api.clubjudge.com/baws/api/countries/ecuador-1',
            events:'http://api.clubjudge.com/baws/api/venues/3520/events',
            upcoming_events:'http://api.clubjudge.com/baws/api/venues/3520/events/upcoming',
            recent_events:'http://api.clubjudge.com/baws/api/venues/3520/events/recent',
            recurring_events:'http://api.clubjudge.com/baws/api/venues/3520/events/recurring',
            self:'http://api.clubjudge.com/baws/api/venues/3520'
         }
      });
    });
  });
});
